nodes.text: The First Brigade, also called the Restuss Brigade, was an organization that patrolled and defended the city Restuss on the Nabooian moon Rori, prior to its destruction in the Battle of Restuss in 1 ABY.

Titles and ranks within the brigade included captain, general, gunner, infiltrator, marine, officer, scout, sergeant, technician and trooper. Members of the First Brigade usually wore gree-colored uniforms.
During the Galactic Civil War, the Restuss Brigade was fighting several local criminal organizations such as the Neo-Cobral and the Garyn Raiders, with the support of the Narmle Militia.

The First Brigade is one of many Non-Player Character (NPC) organizations in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. They could be found in and around the city of Restuss on Rori. Following the destruction of the city in 2006, the NPCs no longer appear inside the destroyed city but can still be found in the region around the city. While the NPCs are all named First Brigade Captain, First Brigade General, etc.. in the game and Star Wars Galaxies strategy guides, their faction is also called Restuss Brigade on the screen that shows a player's standing with the various factions in the game.
